meta.title: FinanzApp - Financial Management
meta.description: Manage your personal finances with our platform that helps you visualize, plan, and optimize your money intuitively. Discover easy-to-use tools that boost your savings and improve your financial well-being. Start for free now!

meta.author: FinanzApp Team
meta.ogDescription: Sign up for FinanzApp in just 30 seconds and revolutionize the way you manage your money. Our all-in-one platform provides intuitive tools to track expenses, boost your savings, and achieve your financial goals, all completely free. Get started now!

meta.title: Contact | FinanzApp
meta.description: Have questions about FinanzApp? Contact us for personalized support with our personal finance management tool. We're here to help you take control of your finances in a simple, fast, and secure way. Reach out to us anytime!

intro.title: Our mission
intro.description: At FinanzApp, we believe everyone deserves control over their personal finances. Our mission is to provide intuitive and accessible tools that help people make informed financial decisions and achieve their economic goals.
intro.vision: Developed as a Final Degree Project at IES La Arboleda ðŸŒ³, FinanzApp was born from the passion for combining technology and finance to create solutions that positively impact people's daily lives.

team.title: Our team
team.description: We are a team of web development students passionate about technology.

bios.israel: Specialized in web development and systems administrator. Currently as an Intern at NTT DATA.
bios.roberto: 2nd Year DAW Student. Currently as an Intern at NTT DATA.
bios.jamal: Web Applications Developer, with self-taught experience. I also have experience and knowledge in systems and network administration, as well as hardware and software IT support.

accessibility.description: We believe financial tools should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their technical knowledge.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly look for new ways to improve our tools and offer innovative solutions to everyday financial problems.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We're clear about how our tools work and how we use information. No surprises or fine print.

cta.title: Have any questions?
cta.description: We're always willing to help you with whatever you need, don't hesitate to contact us, we'd love to help you!

meta.title: About Us | FinanzApp
meta.description: Meet the team behind FinanzApp and discover the values that drive us to build a reliable, intuitive personal finance management tool. Learn about our mission and the passion we put into every feature to help you take control of your finances.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.p1: Welcome to FinanzApp. These Terms and Conditions govern the use of our web application and related services. By accessing or using FinanzApp, you agree to be legally bound by these terms. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not access or use our services.
introduction.p2: FinanzApp is a project developed as a Final Degree Project at the IES La Arboleda center, designed to help users manage their personal finances effectively.

definitions.title: 2. Definitions
definitions.p1: Throughout these Terms and Conditions, the following terms will have the meanings set forth below:
definitions.li1: "FinanzApp", "we", "us", or "our" refers to the web application FinanzApp and its creators.
definitions.li2: "User", "you", or "your" refers to any person who accesses or uses FinanzApp.
definitions.li3: "Services" refers to all functionalities, tools, and content provided through FinanzApp.
definitions.li4: "Account" refers to a user's personal registration on FinanzApp.
definitions.li5: "Personal data" refers to any information related to an identified or identifiable natural person.

account.title: 3. User Account
account.p1: To use certain features of FinanzApp, it is necessary to create an account. By registering, you agree to provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information. It is your responsibility to maintain the confidentiality of your password and account, and you accept full responsibility for activities that occur under your account.
account.p2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if we detect suspicious activity or if you violate these Terms and Conditions.

services.title: 4. Services
services.p1: FinanzApp offers tools for personal financial management, including expense tracking, budgeting, financial analysis, and other related features. We strive to provide accurate and useful services, but we do not guarantee that the services will be error-free or that access to them will be uninterrupted.
services.p2: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of our services at any time without notice.

payments.title: 5. Payments and Billing
payments.p1:
FinanzApp currently offers only free services.
For future paid services, you agree to pay all applicable fees as specified at the time of purchase. Payments will be processed through third-party payment service providers, and you agree to comply with their terms and conditions.
payments.p2: Future subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled before the renewal date. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.

intellectual.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectual.p1: FinanzApp and all its content, features, and functionalities are the property of its creators and are protected by intellectual property laws. Reproduction, distribution, modification, or creation of derivative works without express permission is prohibited.
intellectual.p2: By using FinanzApp, you do not acquire any ownership rights to the service or its content. All rights not expressly granted are reserved.

privacy.title: 7. Privacy and Personal Data
privacy.p1: The collection and use of your personal data are subject to our Privacy Policy, which is an integral part of these Terms and Conditions. By using FinanzApp, you agree to our privacy practices as described in that policy.
privacy.p2: We comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws in the European Union and Spain.
privacy.p3: We collect technical information from your device, including your IP address and approximate geolocation, in order to provide analytical services through Google Analytics. This data is used to analyze traffic and application usage for legal purposes and to improve the user experience. By using our services, you consent to the collection and processing of this data for analytical purposes.

limitations.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitations.p1: FinanzApp is provided "as is" and "as available", without warranties of any kind, express or implied. We do not guarantee that the services will meet your requirements or that they will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free.
limitations.p2: In no event shall we be liable for indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, arising from the use or inability to use our services.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.p1: We may terminate or suspend your access to FinanzApp immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including, but not limited to, if you breach these Terms and Conditions.
termination.p2: Upon termination, your right to use the services will immediately cease. If you wish to terminate your account, you may simply stop using the services or follow the account deletion procedure available in the settings.

modifications.title: 10. Modifications
modifications.p1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. The modifications will take effect immediately after being published on FinanzApp. It is your responsibility to periodically review these terms to stay informed of updates.
modifications.p2: Your continued use of FinanzApp after the publication of the modifications will constitute your acceptance of the new terms.

law.title: 11. Applicable Law
law.p1: These Terms and Conditions will be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Spain, without regard to its conflict of laws provisions.
law.p2: Any dispute relating to these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Madrid, Spain.

contact.title: 12. Contact
contact.p1: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, you can contact us at:
contact.address: Center address: Av. del Oeste, s/n, 28922 AlcorcÃ³n, Madrid

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.meta_description: Learn how FinanzApp collects, uses, and protects your personal data when using our platform.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: This Privacy Policy describes how FinanzApp, developed as part of a Bachelor's Thesis, collects, uses, and protects your personal data. We are committed to ensuring your privacy while using our services.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.p1: We collect the following data to improve our services, ensure security, and provide a better user experience:
information.li1: Username and email address when voluntarily provided (e.g., during registration).
information.li2: Password, securely stored using encryption and hashing techniques.
information.li3: IP address and approximate geographic location, obtained through external services like ipinfo.io. This information is used solely for improving user experience and content personalization.
information.li4: Browser information, including user agent, preferred language, and platform used.
information.li5: Device information, such as screen resolution, CPU usage, available memory, battery level, and network connection type.
information.li6: Data on your interaction with the website, such as visited URLs, referring page, access time and date, clicks, and session duration. This data is used for traffic analysis and improving user experience.
information.li7: Presence of connected multimedia devices (such as microphone or camera), used solely for statistical purposes without accessing audio or video content.
information.li8: Technical errors detected during your browsing, such as page load issues or performance errors.
information.li9: Cookies and similar technologies for personalization, analysis, and service improvement.

usage.title: How we use the information
usage.p1: We use the collected data for the following purposes:
usage.li2: Provide personalized content and language preferences.
usage.li3: Monitor system performance and detect errors or abuses.
usage.li4: Conduct statistical analysis and understand user behavior.
usage.li5: Ensure platform security and prevent fraud or misuse.
usage.li6: Optimize website design, compatibility, and user experience.
usage.li7: Comply with legal obligations and respond to legitimate requests from authorities.
usage.li8: Inform users about important updates or changes to our services or policies.

sharing.title: Sharing of Information
sharing.p1: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except with service providers like Google Analytics for analytical purposes. In specific cases, we may share your data with competent authorities if required by a legal or judicial request.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.p1: We use essential cookies for the site's operation and analytical cookies to improve the user experience.
cookies.p2: We also use cookies and similar technologies to collect technical browser and device information for statistical, security, and personalization purposes.
cookies.p3: You can manage your cookie preferences from your browser settings.

security.title: Security
security.p1: We apply security measures such as authentication tokens and SSL encryption to protect your data from unauthorized access. However, no security measure is completely foolproof, and there is always a slight inherent risk.

rights.title: User Rights
rights.p1: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, and object to the use of your data. You can exercise these rights by contacting us as follows:
rights.li3: Delete your account and all associated data.
rights.li4: Object to the processing of your data in certain circumstances.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.p1: Your data is deleted immediately upon account deletion request. We do not store personal data longer than necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.

changes.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
changes.p1: We reserve the right to update this policy at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via a notice on the platform or by email.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p1: If you have any questions regarding this policy or wish to exercise any of your rights, you can contact us at:
contact.address: Av. del Oeste, s/n, 28922 AlcorcÃ³n, Madrid

reset.title: Reset Password
reset.sent: If the email exists in our records, a reset link has been sent.
